name: Power Poachers
description:
note: The slow load times have been fixed!

You use energy to shoot/dash/fly and it sheilds you from being hit, you'll lose a hp if you run out

TIP: remember you can dash! if anything moves too fast or its hard to get an orb, use the dash

controls: (also explained in game)

R to respawn at last checkpoint (can use anytime)

Space to fly

A and D to move left and right

Right click to dash (hold WASD to aim dash in 8 directions)

left click to shoot (aim with mouse)

You can press K to restart the game

made for metroidvania month 19
